meaningMnemonic: The <radical>flag</radical> is <radical>old</radical> but that doesn't mean it's not still <kanji>alive</kanji>. This is a living flag, and it gets old just like other living things.
readingMnemonic: The flag that is old and <kanji>alive</kanji> is actually a Buddhist relic (that's why it's alive, in fact ... and old!). But, it's a really dumb relic, so it's put in Little <reading>Kyo</reading>to (きょ).
